wxl 2 ork Wmf,aLkfha  i|yka udhsï ;=< msysá fylaghd¾ 6'0 l úYd,;ajfhka hq;= N+ñh yer" my; oelafjk wxl 1 
ork Wmf,aLkfha i|yka udhsï ;=< msysá fylaghd¾ 4"392'0 l úYd,;ajfhka hq;= rcfha bvï j¾I 2024 la jQ wf.daia;=
